title.en: From Adam Comes a Special Line of Descendants

en: From Adam comes a continuing line of descendants.
Through this line, God preserves knowledge of Himself and raises up many prophets.

lines: Adam was the father of Seth,
Jared was the father of Enoch,
and Enoch walked faithfully with God.
Enoch was the father of Methuselah,
and Lamech the father of Noah.

question.en: What do you notice about the importance of family lines and continuity in this passage?
